name: Adv. C/C Panel "Albatross"
description: The highest-performance rigid panel in current service. Advanced 3D-woven carbon-carbon fabric with an iridium oxide refractory coating sustains continuous 1250 K operation, pushing specific rejection above 120 kW/m². The panel array spans 5000 m² yet masses only 10.5 tonnes — a consequence of the composite's exceptional specific stiffness and the thin-shell panel geometry. Mandatory for skutterudite-class thermoelectric generators and any vessel where radiator mass is a first-order design constraint.
